pages.text: qal allah l'iblys: ma lak 'alaa tasjud mae almlayk?
qal 'iiblis mzhrana kibrah whsdh: la ylyq bi 'ana asjd li'iinsan 'awjdtah min tin yabis kan tynana 'aswad mtghyrana
qal allah taealaa lh: fakhruj min aljnt, fa'iinak mtrwd min kuli khyr, wa'iina ealayk allaenat walbed min rahmati 'iilaa yawm yubeath alnaas llhsab waljza'
qal allah taealaa lh: fakhruj min aljnt, fa'iinak mtrwd min kuli khyr, wa'iina ealayk allaenat walbed min rahmati 'iilaa yawm yubeath alnaas llhsab waljza'
qal 'iblys: rabi akhkhirny fi aldunya 'iilaa alyawm aldhy tabeath fih ebadk, wahu yawm alqyamt
qal allah lh: fa'iinak mmn akhkhart hlakhm 'iilaa alyawm aldhy yamut fih kl alkhalq baed alnfkht alawla, la 'iilaa yawm albeth, wa'iinama 'ujyb 'iilaa dhlk astdrajana lah w'imhala wftnt llthqlyn
qal allah lh: fa'iinak mmn akhkhart hlakhm 'iilaa alyawm aldhy yamut fih kl alkhalq baed alnfkht alawla, la 'iilaa yawm albeth, wa'iinama 'ujyb 'iilaa dhlk astdrajana lah w'imhala wftnt llthqlyn
qal 'iblys: rbb bsbb ma 'aghwaytani wadlltny lahssinann ldhryt adam measyk fi alard, wala'udilanahum 'ajmaein ean tariq alhda، 'iilaa eibadak aladhin hdythm fakhlsu lak alebadt whdk dun sayr khlqk
qal 'iblys: rbb bsbb ma 'aghwaytani wadlltny lahssinann ldhryt adam measyk fi alard, wala'udilanahum 'ajmaein ean tariq alhda، 'iilaa eibadak aladhin hdythm fakhlsu lak alebadt whdk dun sayr khlqk

qal allh: hdha tariq mustaqim metdl mwsl 'ily wa'iilaa dar kramty. 'iina eibadi aladhin akhlsu li la 'ajaeal lak sltanana ealaa qulubuhum tdlluhm bih ean alsirat almstqym, lkn sltank ealaa man atabaeak min aldaaliyn almushrikin aladhin raduu bwlaytk wtaetk badalaan min taety

qal allh: hdha tariq mustaqim metdl mwsl 'ily wa'iilaa dar kramty. 'iina eibadi aladhin akhlsu li la 'ajaeal lak sltanana ealaa qulubuhum tdlluhm bih ean alsirat almstqym, lkn sltank ealaa man atabaeak min aldaaliyn almushrikin aladhin raduu bwlaytk wtaetk badalaan min taety
wa'iin alnaar alshadidat lamwed 'iiblis watbaeh ajmeyn, laha sabeat 'abwab kuli bab 'asfal min alakhr, likuli bab min 'atbae 'iiblis qism wnsyb bhsb aemalhm
w'in alnaar alshadidat lamwed 'iiblis watbaeh ajmeyn, laha sabeat 'abwab kuli bab 'asfal min alakhr, likuli bab min 'atbae 'iiblis qism wnsyb bhsb aemalhm

'in aladhin ataqawa allah bamtthal ma 'amar wajtnab ma nha fi basatin wa'anhar jariat yuqal lhm: adkhuluu hadhih aljanaat salimin min kuli su' aminin min kuli edhab. wanazaena ma fi qulubihim min hqd wedawt, yaeishun fi aljanat 'ikhwanana mthabyn, yjlswn ealaa asrrat ezymt, ttqabl wujuhuhum twasla wthabbana, la yusibuhum fiha teb wala 'ieya', wahum baqwn fiha abdana

'in aladhin ataqawa allah bamtthal ma 'amar wajtnab ma nha fi basatin wa'anhar jariat yuqal lhm: adkhuluu hadhih aljanaat salimin min kuli su' aminin min kuli edhab. wanazaena ma fi qulubihim min hqd wedawt, yaeishun fi aljanat 'ikhwanana mthabyn, yjlswn ealaa asrrat ezymt, ttqabl wujuhuhum twasla wthabbana, la yusibuhum fiha teb wala 'ieya', wahum baqwn fiha abdana

'iina aladhin ataqawa allah bamtthal ma 'amar wajtnab ma nha fi basatin wa'anhar jariat yuqal lhm: adkhuluu hadhih aljanaat salimin min kuli su' aminin min kuli edhab. wanazaena ma fi qulubihim min hqd wedawt, yaeishun fi aljanat 'ikhwanana mthabyn, yjlswn ealaa asrrat ezymt, ttqabl wujuhuhum twasla wthabbana, la yusibuhum fiha teb wala 'ieya', wahum baqwn fiha abdana

akhbr -ayha alrswl- eibadi 'aniy 'ana alghafur lilmuminin altaybyn, alrahim bhm, wa'ana eadhabi hu aleadhab almwlm almwje lighayr altaybyn. wakhbrhm -ayha alrswl- ean duyuf 'iibrahim min almalayikat aladhin bshsharwh balwld, wbhlak qawm lwt
